Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The feedback from our teacher has a better impact as they are tailored for us (personal) however, for quicker response or feedback i think students will tend to ask chatGPT to get the feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from the teacher is way better and more trustworthy than feedback from GenAI. I liked it better when i received feedback from the teacher because it is more reliable and tailored to me while feedback from GenAI is too broad and general.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback from teacher are more personal and constructed based on what we wrote
